entry.title: idea的Version—Control缺失解决办法
entry.content: 背景 想直接使用idea进行git操作，并且减少smartgit的使用，故使用idea。但是项目导入完成后，Version Control菜单缺失。 解决办法 打开搜索引擎，找到前辈的解决方法，前几页的尝试结果，均以失败告终。(😔)经过自己的一番尝试，解决方法如下：菜单栏->cvs->Enabde Version Control Integration选择git。大公告成！(🙂)经实测以上方案适用于如下idea版本，其它版本的没有试过！

entry.title: redis如何刷新缓存
entry.content: 打开cmd 输入redis-cli -h ip地址 -p 端口号 输入keys * 输入flushall 再次输入keys *，查看是否清空缓存成功。 输入exit

entry.title: 使用idea如何debug jetty
entry.content: 背景 由于项目的原因需要使用jetty，并且debug。 搜索引擎，大部分的方案都是转载的，看了几个并不能解决问题，所以只能自己想办法了。 考虑使用Remote,替代大部分人提到的使用maven的哪种方式，详细步骤如下： 选择Edit Configuration... 点击+ 选择 Remote 然后填写信息,根据自己的项目信息不同需要自行进行调整信息，主要是端口号

entry.title: Learning English Day22
entry.content: Grit is the key to successSo i left the classroom and I went to graduate school to become a psychologist.I started studying kids and adults in all kinds of super challenging settings.and in every study my question was .who is successful here and why?My research team and I went to West Point Military Academy.We tried to predict which cadets would stay in military training and which would drop out.We went to the National Spelling Bee and tried to predict which children would advance farthest in competition.We studied rookie teachers working in really tough neighborhoods ,asking which teachers are still going to be here in teaching by the end of the school year.and fo those, who will be the most effective at improving learning outcomes for their students?We partnered with private companies ,asking ,which of these salepeople is going to keep their jobs?And who’s going to earn the most money.

entry.title: Learning English Day21
entry.content: Change mindset Change brainJust the word’s “yet” or “not yet”,we’re finding,give kids greater confidence ,give them a path into the future that creates greater persistence.And we can actuallly change students’mindsets.In one study ,we taught them that every thime they push out of their comfort zone to learn something new and difficult .the neurons in their brain can from new.stronger connections .and over time they can get smarter.Lool what happend.In his study .students who were not taught this growth mindset continued to show declining grades over this difficult school transition.but those who were taught htis lesson showed a sharp rebound in their grades.We have shown this now .this kind of improvement with thousands and thousands of kids.especially struggling students.

entry.title: Learnging English Day20
entry.content: Method of learningAlfred North Whitehead said it one thme that.”the rapid advance of civilization came only when man invaented the method of invention”And of course he was refering to the huge growth of GDP per capita and all the other good things that we now take for granted which started a few hundred years ago and before that all was stasis.So if civilization can progress only when it invents the method of invention ,you can progress only when you learn the method of learning.I was very lucky.I came to law school having learned the method of learning and nothing has served me better in my long life than continuous learning.And if you take Warren Buffett and watched him with a time clock,I would say half of all the time he spends is sitting on his ass and reading.And a big chunk of the rest of the time is spent talking one on one .either on the telephone or personally,with highly gifted people whom he trusts and who trust him.In other words.It looks quite academic.all this worldly success.

entry.title: Learning English Day19
entry.content: compound interestAnd very early , probably when i was seven or so.I took this book our of the Bensen ,Libary called”A thousand ways to make a $1000”And one of the ways in this book was having penny weighing machines.I sat adn calculated how much it would cost to buy the first weighing machine,and then how long it would take for the profit from that one to buy another one.And I would sit there and create these compound interest tables to figure out how long it would take me to have a weighting machines for every person in the world.I had everybody in the countty weighting themselves ten times a day.and me just sitting there like john D.Rockfeller of weighting machines.That allwoance when I was a little boy was a nicked week.But I liked the idea of having a little more than a nickel a week to work with.And I want into bussiness ver early.I started sell Coca_Cola door to door.I sold gum door to door.I sold “Saturday Evening post”,”Liberty” Magazine “Ladies Home journal” you name it.I think I enjoyed the game almost right from the start.But I like being my own boss.That’s one thing i Liked about delivering papers.I could arrange the route I wanted.Nobody was bothering me at 5:00 or 6:00 in the morning.I was delivering 500 papers a day.And I mand a penny a parper.but in terms of compounding .that penny has turned into something else.

entry.title: Learning English Day18
entry.content: I always kenw I was going to be richI always knew I was going to be rich.I don’t think i ever doubted it for a minute.Einsteinis reputed to have sad that “compound interest is the eighth wonder of the woeld”.Or something like that.And it goes back to that story ,you probably learned when you were in grade school.Where sombody did something for the key.And the king said .”What can i do for you?”And he said ,”Well .lets take a chessboard and put one kernel of wheat on the first square.and then double it one the second and double it on the thrid”And the king really agreed to it and by the time he figured out what two theo 64 amounted to .he was giving away the entire kingdom.So it’s a pretty simple concept but over thime it accomlishes extraoridinary things.

entry.title: Learning English Day17
entry.content: Think differentHere’s to the crazy ones.The misfits.The rebeis.The troublemakers.The round pags in the square holes.The ones who see things differently.They’re not fond of rules.And thy have no respect for the status quo.You can quote them.disagree with them.glority of vility them.About the only thing you can’t do is ignore them.Because they change things.They push the human race forward.And while some may see them as the crazy ones.we see genius.Because the people who are crazy enough to think they cna change the world.are the ones who do.

entry.title: Learning English Day16
entry.content: Super hardThe first you need to work ,if you depending on how well you want to do?Particularly if you’re starting a company .you need to work super hard.So what dode super hard mean?Well ,when my brother and I were starting up our first company ,instead of getting an apartment ,we just rented a small office.And we slept on the couch.And we showered at the YMCA.We’re so hard up.We had just one computerThe website was up during the day.and I was coding at night .seven days a week,all time.And I briefly had a girlfirend at that period.And in order to be with me.she had to sleep in the office.So I work hard like at every waking hour.That’s the thing I would say particularly if you are starting a company.And if you do simple math.say like If somebody else is working 50 hours.and you’re working 100,you’ll get twice as much done in the course of a year as the other company.

entry.title: Smartgit到期解决办法
entry.content: smargit到期后的解决办法很简单，主要就是删除C:\Users\{username}\AppData\Roaming\syntevo\SmartGit\{version}目录下的setting.xml文件即可。手动删除虽然也快，但是需要点点点，这就很烦人，所以提供以三种解决办法。 Bat(适用于Windows操作系统)1234\# 手动打开文件夹删除start "" "C:\Users\{your_userName}\AppData\Roaming\syntevo\SmartGit\{version}"\# 直接删除del /f /s /q C:\Users\{your_userName}\AppData\Roaming\syntevo\SmartGit\{version}\setting.xml Java1234567891011121314151617package io.caoxx.o3SimpleSort.demo;import java.io.File;public class DeleteSmatgitSettingxmlDemo { public static void main(String[] args) { String path="C:\\Users\\{your_userName}\\AppData\\Roaming\\syntevo\\SmartGit\\{version}"; File file=new File(path); File [] files=file.listFiles(); for (File file1:files) { if (file1.getName().equals("setting.xml")){ file1.delete(); System.out.println("成功删除smartgit的配置文件"); } } }} Python12345678\#使用os.unlink()和os.remove()来删除文件\# -*- coding:utf-8 -*-import osmy_file = 'C:/Users/{your_userName}/AppData/Roaming/syntevo/SmartGit/{version}/setting.xml'if os.path.exists(my_file): #删除文件 os.remove(my_file) print("成功删除smartgit的配置文件")

entry.title: Learning English Day15
entry.content: Bend your universeOur thoughts feeling.dreams.and ideas are physical in the Universe.If we dream something ,if we picture something ,and if we commit ourselves to it-that is a physical thrust towards realization that we send out into the universe.The universe it not a thing that’s going to push us around.The world.people nd sitations are not going to push us around.We are going to bend the universe;we are going to command and DEMAND that the universe become what we want it to be.I studied the patterns of the universe.There’s a redemptive power that making a choice has.Rather than feeling like you’re just addected bu all the things happening make a choiceJust DECIDE what you’re gonna be.who you’re gonna be and how you’re gonna do it.Just decideFrom that point on,the Universe is gonna get out your way.

entry.title: Java实现文件归类复制
entry.content: 最近在汇总整理电脑上的资料，由于资料的结构大部分都如下所示：12345D_|_FolderA_|_a.pdf | |_b.xml | |_FolderAson_|_aa.pdf | |_b.xml |_FolderB手动自己整理是不可能的，所以需要计算机帮助我们完成任务。具体代码实现如下：12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243444546474849package io.caoxx.File.demo;import java.io.File;import java.io.FileNotFoundException;import java.io.FileOutputStream;import java.io.IOException;import java.nio.file.Files;import java.nio.file.Paths;public class FileLookupCopyDemo { public static void main(String[] args) { // 要复制的文件类型 String[] fileType = { ".pdf"}; // 目标路径 String path = "D:\\CHD\\v3"; String targetPath="D:\\CHD"; try { FileLookupCopyDemo.LookupFile(path,fileType); } catch (IOException e) { e.printStackTrace(); } } /** * @param path 目标路径 * @param fileType 目标文件格式 */ public static void LookupFile(String path,String [] fileType) throws IOException { File file = new File(path); File[] files = file.listFiles(); for (File file1 : files) { if (file1.isDirectory()) { LookupFile(file1.getPath(),fileType); } else { if (fileType.length<0){ System.out.println("输出所有得文件格式"); }else{ for (String s:fileType) { if (file1.getName().endsWith(s)) { Files.copy(Paths.get(file1.getPath()),new FileOutputStream(new File(targetPath+file1.getName()))); } } } } } }}

entry.title: Learning English Day14
entry.content: Sickening work ethicThe separation of talent and skill is one of the greatest misunderstood concepts for people who are frying to excel who have derams,Who want to do things.Talent you have naturally.Skill is only developed by hours and hours of beating on your craft.I’ve never really viewed myself as particularly talented.And where I exeel is ridiculous .sickening work ethic.You know,while the other guy’s sleeping ? I’m workingWhile the other guy’s eatin? I’m working.There’s no easy way around it.No matter how talented you are,you talent is going to fail you if you’re not skilled.If you don’t study work really hard and dedicate yourslef to getting better every single day.You’ll never be able to communicate you artistry to people the way that you want.The only thing that I see that is distinctly different about me that is that I’m not afarid to die on a treadmill.You might have more tablent than me ,you minght be smarter than me ,but if we get on a treadmill togerther there’re to two things.You’re getting off first.or I’m gonna die.It’s really that simple.

entry.title: Learning English Day13
entry.content: Do want you need to do I have a great time with my life,and I want to share it.I love leaving.I think that’s infectious.It’s something you can’t fake.Greatness is not this wonderful esoteric elusive god-like feature that only special people possess.It’s someting that truly exists within all of us.It’s very simple.This is what I believe ,and I’m willing to die for it .Period.It’s that simple.I know who I am,I know what I believe and that’s all I need to know.From there,you do what you need to do.You know.I think what happens is we make the situation more compiex.

entry.title: Learning English Day12
entry.content: Lay this brick prefectlyOne summer his dad tore down a brick wall in the front his business and told 12-years-old will and his 9-years-old brotherto rebuild it.A job they said was impossible.It took them a year and a half,but they did it.And he said,”now don’t you ever tell me there’s something that you can’t do”You don’t set out to build a wallyou don’t say “I’m going to build the biggest ,baddest,greatest wall that’s ever been”You don’t start thereYou say,”I’m gonna lay this brick as perfectly as a brick can be laid”You do that every single day.And soon you have a wall

entry.title: Learning English Day11
entry.content: It takes a strong man to save himself,and a great man to save anotherThese walls are funny.First you hate them.then you get used to them.Enough time passes,you depend on them ,That’s institutionalized.I guess it comes down to a simple choice,get busy living or get busy dyingIn 1996,Andy Dufresne escaped from Shawshank Prison.All they found(of him) was a muddy set of prison clothes,a bar fo soap,adn an old rockhammer damn near worn woun to the nub.I remeber thinking it would take a man six hundred-years to tunnel through the wall with it .Old Andy did ti less than twenty.

entry.title: Learning English Day10
entry.content: Without victory,there is no survivalI would say to the House,as i said to those who have joined the goverment “I have nothing to offer but blood.toil.tears and sweat”.We have before us an ordeal of the most grievous kind.We have before us many,many long months of struggle and of suffering.You ask,what is out policy?I will say.It is to wage war,by sea,land and air with all our might .with all the strength that god has given us ,to wage war against a monstrous tyranny,never surpassed in the dark,and lamentable catalogue of human crime.That is our policy!You ask ,what is our aim?I can answer one word! victory.Victory and all costs,victory in spite of all terror,victory,however long and hard the roda may be.For without victory,there is no suivival!

entry.content: Will fightI am Wiliam Wallcae.And I see a whole army of my countrymen here in defiance of tyranny.You’ve come to fight as free men.And free men you are.what will you do with that freedom>Will you fight?Fight ,and you may die.Run and you’ll live …at least awhile.And dying in your beds many years form now.would you be will to trade all the days from this day to that.For one chance,Just for one chance.To come back here and tell our enemies that they may take our lives.But they’ll never take our freedom!

entry.title: Learning English Day06
entry.content: Pushing through the painAs ga magician ,I try to create images that make people stop and thiks say are not possible .I also try to challenge mysel As f to do things that doctors say are not possible .As a magician I try to show things to people tha seem impossible.And I think magic,whether I’m holding my breath or shuffling a deck of cards,is pretty simple.It’s practice.it’s trainingAnd it’s practice,It’s training and experimenting while pushing through the pain to the best that I can be.And that’s what magic is to me ,so thank you.

entry.title: Jetty如何debug
entry.content: 首先在eclipse中右键单击debug as,选择debug configurations. 鼠标选中Remote Java Application,点击默认，一切皆默认即可. run debug 启动jetty，然后选中自己新建的Remote Java application,点击debug即可.

entry.title: Eclipse配置cmd
entry.content: 如何在eclipse中配置git或者cmd命令行 点击Eclipse的External Tools Congratulations。 选中program 点击new。 Mian中的location选择cmd.exe或者gitbash.exe所在位置。 Working Directory选择目录。 在common中选择对应的编码，如果第3步中的选择的是cmd，则编码中手动输入：GB18030
